name: Attendance Scan Report
query:
SELECT
    c.name As "Event",
    sl.programme AS "Programme",
    sl.date_time AS "Date_Time",
    sl.participant_name,
    p.name AS "Participant_Id"
FROM
    `tabScanned List` AS sl
JOIN
 
    `tabConfer Agenda` AS ca
ON
    sl.programme = ca.name
JOIN
    `tabConfer` AS c
ON
    ca.parent = c.name
JOIN 
    `tabEvent Participant` AS ep
ON
    sl.participant=ep.name
JOIN 
    `tabParticipant` AS p
ON
    ep.participant=p.name
WHERE
    c.name = %(event_name)s
    and ca.name= %(agenda_name)s
